ttp_template:
<group name="additional_answers_authority_flags">
fqdn: {{FQDN | ORPHRASE}}
qlen: {{QLEN | ORPHRASE}}
flags: {{FLAGS | ORPHRASE}}
ipindex: {{IPINDEX | ORPHRASE}}
questions: {{QUESTIONS | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
fqdn: example.com
qlen: 0
flags: 0x20a00000
ipindex: v4
questions: 1
answers: 2
authority: 0
additional: 0

query: example.com IN A
answer: 192.0.2.1
answer: 192.0.2.2
textfsm_template:
Value FQDN (\S+)
Value QLEN (\d+)
Value FLAGS (\S+)
Value IPINDEX (\S+)
Value QUESTIONS (\d+)
Value ANSWERS (\d+)
Value AUTHORITY (\d+)
Value ADDITIONAL (\d+)

Start
  ^fqdn:\s+${FQDN}\s*$$
  ^qlen:\s+${QLEN}\s*$$
  ^flags:\s+${FLAGS}\s*$$
  ^ipindex:\s+${IPINDEX}\s*$$
  ^questions:\s+${QUESTIONS}\s*$$
  ^answers:\s+${ANSWERS}\s*$$
  ^authority:\s+${AUTHORITY}\s*$$
  ^additional:\s+${ADDITIONAL}\s*$$
